website_summaries.verdict: Showing off a '90s trail vibe, the Reebok Zigwild Trail 6.0 brings an outdoor touch to the runner's daily run. Featuring a superbly technical outsole configuration, the trail running shoe offers superior shock mitigation. It effectively distributes impact energy for a comfortable and well-protected ride. With the Zigwild Trail 6.0, athletes can experience a grippy, reliable function.
pros: Quite a few wearers attest to the comfort of the Reebok Zigwild Trail 6.0
Some of the runners hail the running shoe for its secure wrap
The trail shoe has ample support, lauded several athletes
A number of commenters praise the grippy traction of the running shoe
It does not require a break-in period, observed various users
Multiple testers commend the convenient foot entry provided by the shoe
The neutral running shoe amplifies stability, expressed a few buyers
cons: According to some critics, the running shoe lacks durability
The platform is too tight, especially on the forefoot, remarked one customer
It constricts foot motions, shared some runners

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these to referee soccer outdoors. I have the Reebok Zigs for basketball and they are great. So I figured the trail running shoes must be pretty good too. I was having a lot of pain in my feet after doing 2 or 3 games and couldn't take it anymore. The first day I wore these I had games from 8:30am to 8pm. I was sore at the end of the day but it was nowhere near as bad without them. I should mention i also went to the Walmart Dr. School's kiosk and got fitted for inserts. The combination has made it much easier to referee those long days.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: the fit is awful, Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I only buy reebok shoes and these are by far the worst I have ever had. this would have been my 3rd pair of the zig's, but I sent them back. They don't want to stay on your foot, the heal slides up as you walk and they were the correct size because I have the 5th generation of the zig's and they fit great. Do Not Buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Man I love these sneakers so much I bought a second pair will purchase the gray and red sole soon 10.5 fit perfect looks great on my feet
customer_reviews.author: HerbertStevens

customer_reviews.title: They are worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this type of shoe! Love them. They make great walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Never a can go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Zig style of shoes. Happy to find them. Comfortable and not as heavy as they appear. Maybe just a little tall but not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bobolino

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: There is no dislike with this product - great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: NOT good for running or walking. Buy original because these are poor imitations.
customer_reviews.author: A Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Till up now it is what I was expecting. Comfortable , the size fits me properly.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Massillon

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of this model of Reebok shoe. The shoes I purchased through Amazon appeared to either be knock offs or factory seconds. The shoes were falling apart out of the box, where they were glued, and the glue had not set, and the padding on one shoe versus the other was off.
customer_reviews.author: King David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact same pair a few years ago and I like them so much, I decided to get another pair. They fit as expected, look rugged, great traction, and fast delivery. If they still make these when I need another pair, I will definitely buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and price.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable. I went hiking and they gripped the ground well. They are made of high quality material. I would definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: ARod

customer_reviews.title: Great traction
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trading off road for many years with the Zigwilds. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: tony burometto

customer_reviews.title: They’re great
customer_reviews.text: What did i use this product for? What kinda question is that? Anyway it was for my feet. Helps with my ankles hurting, and zigtech is the only shoe thats helped so far. Anyway they’re great
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Still a fan of Reeboks
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Reebok shoes for walking around and doing yardwork on the weekends, etc. for years now. These shoes fall in line with that tradition and I'm very happy with them. I'm very happy I was able to buy them on Amazon without even having to try them on, in fact. For someone who has a bit of a high arch, these shoes are very comfortable. I definitely recommend them for everyday use (but not at work, haha). I give them 4.5/5 stars. I deducted .5 stars only because I wish they came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: The_Phantom

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality control
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has poor quality control in the TR 6 model. The asymmetric shoe lace runs are prone to pull out. Hence the 1 star. My shoes ripped while breaking them in walking within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grabenstein

customer_reviews.title: poor quality control gets these shoes one star
customer_reviews.text: The asymmetric lace guides pull out of the one side. Leaving you with a shoe that will not lace properly. On affected shoes this takes very little force or wear to cause.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grabenstein

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's ZigWild Tr 6 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: These men's running shoes bring an outdoor feel to your everyday routine. The upper shows off a '90s trail vibe. The innovative outsole disperses energy for a comfortable feel from heel strike to toe-off.
feature_bullets: Innovative ZigTech outsole disperses energy for enhanced cushioning from heel strike to toe-off
